radiographic_examinations.findings: Localized an enlarged parathyroid gland inferior to the right thyroid lobe.
Localized an enlarged parathyroid gland in the left lower neck.

radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Pre- and postoperative scans showed normal bone density at the spine, hip, and radius.

radiographic_examinations.findings: Calvarial thickening with widening of the diploic space and calcification of the intracranial carotid arteries.
Revealed calvarial hyperostosis and periosteal resorption in the fingers.
